resources.string: Welcome to our country booking agency

#TODO Hotel agency is a company that has only one focus, you, the customer. We provide the best prices and make sure they are up to date in order for you to enjoy your time at the location as much as possible.
#TODO We offer options in the most exotic of locations such as Spain, United States, Austria, United Kingdom and many more.

S.C. Metronom S.R.L. a fost infiintata din anul 2007 si are ca principala activitate distribuitia de piese auto pentru toate marcile de autoturisme si camioane. Oferim distributie prin masinile proprii in zona Transilvania iar in restul tarii prin curierat rapid. Comenzile locale din Tirgu Mures vor fi livrate in mod gratuit. Comenzi din judetul Mures vor fi livrate sunt livrate in mod gratuit daca valoarea comenzii depaseste 100RON+TVA. Pentu celelalte judete din Transilvania costul transportului va fi stabilit conform comenzilor. Costul transportului va fi suportat de client.

Adresa: bul. 1848 nr. 19, cartierul Dambu Pietros, Langa Darina 
Tel./Fax: 0265-319.529 
Mobil: 0746-052.949 
Rds: 0365-730.177 
E-mail: contact@pieseautometronom.ro
